Class Card

java.lang.Object
  Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Card>
public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Card>, java.io.Serializable

The class Card describes a playing card and the set of cards

See Also:
Deck, Hand, Board, Serialized Form
